name: campaign_performance_matrix
description:
This mart model creates a performance matrix that cross-tabulates campaign goals against customer segments.
It provides a comprehensive view of which goal-segment combinations perform best across key metrics:
Conversion Rate, ROI, Acquisition Cost, and CTR.
The model calculates absolute performance, relative performance against goal/segment/global averages,
ranks combinations, computes normalized scores, and identifies top performers and untested combinations.
It helps identify the most effective targeting strategies and highlights opportunities for optimization.

columns.name: goal
columns.description: The specific objective of the campaigns being analyzed (e.g., 'Product Launch', 'Brand Awareness'). This forms one dimension of the matrix.

columns.name: segment
columns.description: The customer segment targeted by the campaigns (e.g., 'Technology', 'Fashion'). This forms the other dimension of the matrix.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The total number of campaigns associated with this specific goal-segment combination.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: The average conversion rate achieved by campaigns for this goal-segment combination. Higher is generally better.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: The average Return on Investment (ROI) for campaigns targeting this goal-segment combination. Higher is better.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: The average cost to acquire a customer (or achieve the conversion goal) for this goal-segment combination. Lower is generally better.

columns.name: avg_ctr
columns.description: The average Click-Through Rate (CTR) for campaigns targeting this goal-segment combination, indicating engagement. Higher is generally better.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_goal_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average conversion rate and the average conversion rate for all campaigns with the same goal. Positive values indicate performance above the goal average.

columns.name: roi_vs_goal_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average ROI and the average ROI for all campaigns with the same goal. Positive values indicate performance above the goal average.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_goal_avg
columns.description: The relative performance of this combination's average acquisition cost compared to the average for the same goal. Calculated as (Goal Avg Cost / Combination Avg Cost) - 1. Positive values indicate lower (better) cost than the goal average.

columns.name: ctr_vs_goal_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average CTR and the average CTR for all campaigns with the same goal. Positive values indicate performance above the goal average.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average conversion rate and the average conversion rate for all campaigns targeting the same segment. Positive values indicate performance above the segment average.

columns.name: roi_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average ROI and the average ROI for all campaigns targeting the same segment. Positive values indicate performance above the segment average.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: The relative performance of this combination's average acquisition cost compared to the average for the same segment. Calculated as (Segment Avg Cost / Combination Avg Cost) - 1. Positive values indicate lower (better) cost than the segment average.

columns.name: ctr_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average CTR and the average CTR for all campaigns targeting the same segment. Positive values indicate performance above the segment average.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_global_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average conversion rate and the global average conversion rate across all campaigns. Positive values indicate performance above the global average.

columns.name: roi_vs_global_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average ROI and the global average ROI across all campaigns. Positive values indicate performance above the global average.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_global_avg
columns.description: The relative performance of this combination's average acquisition cost compared to the global average. Calculated as (Global Avg Cost / Combination Avg Cost) - 1. Positive values indicate lower (better) cost than the global average.

columns.name: ctr_vs_global_avg
columns.description: The percentage difference between this combination's average CTR and the global average CTR across all campaigns. Positive values indicate performance above the global average.

columns.name: conversion_rate_rank
columns.description: Overall rank of this goal-segment combination based on average conversion rate (descending). Rank 1 is the best.

columns.name: conversion_rate_rank_within_goal
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average conversion rate compared to other segments within the same goal (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the goal.

columns.name: conversion_rate_rank_within_segment
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average conversion rate compared to other goals within the same segment (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the segment.

columns.name: roi_rank
columns.description: Overall rank of this goal-segment combination based on average ROI (descending). Rank 1 is the best.

columns.name: roi_rank_within_goal
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average ROI compared to other segments within the same goal (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the goal.

columns.name: roi_rank_within_segment
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average ROI compared to other goals within the same segment (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the segment.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_rank
columns.description: Overall rank of this goal-segment combination based on average acquisition cost (ascending). Rank 1 is the best (lowest cost).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_rank_within_goal
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average acquisition cost compared to other segments within the same goal (ascending). Rank 1 is the best (lowest cost) within the goal.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_rank_within_segment
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average acquisition cost compared to other goals within the same segment (ascending). Rank 1 is the best (lowest cost) within the segment.

columns.name: ctr_rank
columns.description: Overall rank of this goal-segment combination based on average CTR (descending). Rank 1 is the best.

columns.name: ctr_rank_within_goal
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average CTR compared to other segments within the same goal (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the goal.

columns.name: ctr_rank_within_segment
columns.description: Rank of this combination's average CTR compared to other goals within the same segment (descending). Rank 1 is the best within the segment.

columns.name: conversion_rate_score
columns.description: Normalized score (0-1) based on the overall conversion rate rank. Higher score indicates better relative performance.

columns.name: roi_score
columns.description: Normalized score (0-1) based on the overall ROI rank. Higher score indicates better relative performance.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_score
columns.description: Normalized score (0-1) based on the overall acquisition cost rank (lower cost = higher score). Higher score indicates better relative performance.

columns.name: ctr_score
columns.description: Normalized score (0-1) based on the overall CTR rank. Higher score indicates better relative performance.

columns.name: composite_score
columns.description: A weighted score combining the normalized scores for conversion rate (30%), ROI (40%), acquisition cost (20%), and CTR (10%). Provides an overall performance indicator for the goal-segment combination.

columns.name: is_high_conversion
columns.description: Flag indicating if the combination's average conversion rate is more than 10% above the global average.

columns.name: is_high_roi
columns.description: Flag indicating if the combination's average ROI is more than 10% above the global average.

columns.name: is_cost_efficient
columns.description: Flag indicating if the combination's average acquisition cost performance is more than 10% better (lower cost) than the global average (i.e., acquisition_cost_vs_global_avg > 0.1).

columns.name: is_high_engagement
columns.description: Flag indicating if the combination's average CTR is more than 10% above the global average.

columns.name: is_top_performer
columns.description: Flag indicating if this goal-segment combination ranks in the top 10% based on the composite score.

columns.name: is_untested_combination
columns.description: Flag indicating if this goal-segment combination had zero associated campaigns in the source data (campaign_count = 0).
